name: Mad Scientist: Black Hole
description:
Mad Scientist: Black Hole -

A crazed Mad Scientist is trying to rewind time and break the laws of physics. You have a near limitless disposal of disposable robots to try and stop him using the laws of physics and time-bending powers! Power up your robots with upgrades like homing shot, and time shift and challenge your perceptions of space and time!

This game was made by:

@JackRDavis - programming, art, design, sound effects.

@creid3200 - theme song, testing

Included is a copy of the theme song to add to a playlist!

Thanks to @JoeRogan for the motivation!

Thank you for supporting this game, the developers and our passion to create games that challenge our fans!
